objects.description:
Monitor network data for uncommon data flows. Processes utilizing the network that do not normally have network communication or have never been seen before are suspicious.

Analytic 1 - Service Control Manager spawning Command Shell

service_proto = filter flows where (dest_port == 445 and proto_info.pipe == “SVCCTL”) service_create = filter flows where (proto_info.function == “CreateServiceW” OR proto_info.function == “CreateServiceA” OR proto_info.function == “StartServiceW” OR proto_info.function == “StartServiceA” )
